comment.author: 99490033@N02
comment._content: Berlin Foundling House was a German Protestant Christian missionary society that was involved in sending workers to China during the late Qing Dynasty.

comment.author: 9945877@N02
comment._content: This building was located in the site which was occupied by the Police Station, which now houses the David Trench Rehabilitation Centre because of West Island Line works. See the report below for more information: www.amo.gov.hk/form/Police_station.pdf
